page.title: 04A DAY OUT IN NEWENT
page.content: I woke up at 8.00 and after watching Scooby-doo and Wide Awake Club on T.V. I dressed. I put on trousers because I was going with five friends to the {Falconry Centre}at{Newent.}On the way Edith's dad missed the turning so we had to go back. I took Â£1.00 to spend on souvenirs. On arrival we went to see the flying demonstration by Smith and Twisted Sister, the{Tawny Eagles.} After our picnic, we had a guided tour of the aviaries. We saw{Goldie}the {Golden Eagle}who escaped from Regent's Park Zoo, now in retirement at Newent. Next we saw Smith and Blewitt the {Lanner Falcon}give a flying demon- stration. After that we bought souven- irs at the shop. I bought a small pen, a keyring, a bird of prey's feather, & a postcard of a Sparrowhawk feeding her young. In the evening I swam in a Gala at Ross.Tomorrow is Father's day.
